content: the non stop top is knitted in one piece without breaking yarn it is flexible in size and can just as well be worn inside out so toddlers and small children can easily be trusted to dress themselves the pattern is avaliable in english and norwegian fremgangsmåte for å strikke et ekstra stykke så trøya blir til en justerbar body finner du her norwegians instructions to convert the top into a onesie is found here 1 **july 2011 ** a slightly revised version of the pdf the design is still the same **about the size** - i keep getting feedback that the sizes are small - how tightly do you guys knit my boy s tops have plenty of room for them still and are very soft and elastic my experience is that the tightness is mostly in the cast on and bind off so you should be very careful to get those elastic enough but i realize that i do not knit particularly tightly myself so if you do - you might want to go up a size or needle size and guys - it looks ridiculously small along the way it stretches i promise 1 http //ribbestrikk blogspot com/2011/08/lag-body-av-trya html
